headline: Cloudflare Gateway now protects teams, wherever they are
keywords: Zero Trust, Zero Trust Week, 1.1.1.1, Product News, WARP, Cloudflare Gateway, SWG, Cloudflare Zero Trust, Security
description: Announcing a full Secure Web Gateway at the Cloudflare edge. Cloudflare Gateway provides security wherever organizations operate via the Cloudflare WARP client.
